ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Popularity with Rivervalers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Dont I know it!  I spent the better part of 10 levels trying to cover my Half Elfs butt.  You dont see the men appear in Loin cloths, My personal vote
ygData.messageBody:
you wrote:

>Oh, and btw, I'm a SHE not a he. <g> I had to chuckle at the couple
>posts that referenced me as a "he" or a "him". ;-) I'm the cute little
>redheaded woodelf running around Rivervale (Quellious) in the *very*
>skimpy bathing suit the EQ developers dressed me in.

Dont I know it! I spent the better part of 10 levels trying to cover my
Half Elfs butt. You dont see the men appear in Loin cloths, My personal
vote would be Speedo's......


Jaezebel Moonsong
Gypsy Bard of the 20th Stanza
Innoruuk
